attributes.action: Rudy Guilliani should be immediately stripped of his Knighthood awarded to him.
attributes.additional_details:
It is inappropriate for anyone who has denied the democratic process of their country, and has worked to try to nullify a legal election actions which culminated in encouragement for people to attempt a coup on Wednesday 6th January 2021 to remain a KBE.
Rudy Guilliani should be stripped of this honour immediately and publicly condemned to show that our country values democracy and refutes those who encourage violence to overturn elections that are legitimate.
attributes.background: Parliament should publicly condemn the actions of Rudy Guilliani who has not only bought the honour of holding a KBE into disgrace but has incited violence and help to instigate an attempted coup leading to the death of 6 people including 2 serving police officers

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
